1.content:
You have 5 choices as to where to go:

Normal Skylanders: The ordinary guys. No gimmicks about them.

Giants: They're huge!

Swap Force: Have your choice between all of the 256 choices of characters.

The New Skylanders: A new branch of Skylanders. Place these guys on the Portal of Power, and you'll be surprised at what they can do.

You?: Well, you'll just have to click to find out.
1.title: The Beginning

1131.content: So, here we have Spyro, the practical leader of the Skylanders, as well as the star of his own game series. So, tell me, what's gonna happen here with our beloved hero?
1131.title: Beginning with the hero, eh?

choices: He transforms into a different Skylander
11311.content: What does Skylanders Spyro transform into?
11311.title: Transformation

choices: Okay, but he's going to have a hard time learning how to walk on just two legs
113112.content: Maybe Spyro transforms into a human?
113112.title: Human Spyro?

1131121.content: So, the main character of Skylanders, namely Spyro, is going to transform into a human. This could end up becoming very awkward for him, since he will have to get used to walking on just two legs instead of four, but there's still one big question to answer: what causes Spyro to transform in the first place?
1131121.title: Spyro turns into a human, but what causes it?

choices: Yes! Make Spyro an anthro dragon!
No! Go with some other choice!
1131122.content: Maybe Spyro will transform into an anthropomorphic dragon?
1131122.title: The next best thing to turning him human?

choices: Now, that sounds like it could get interesting. Go for it!
No way! That's just WAY too weird! NEXT!!!
11311222.content: Maybe Spyro grows a few extra heads and his neck(s) elongates, turning him into a dragon-hydra? (Please bear in mind that no matter how many heads he gets, they do NOT have seperate thoughts and/or personalities; Spyro has one conciousness in multiple heads. Ergo; Spyro has to adjust to looking out of several pairs of eyes simultaniously and avoiding getting his multiple long necks entangled in knots, all of which is still attached to his regular dragon body!)
11311222.title: Three (or more) heads is better than one?

14.content: Well, now we come to the newest additions to the group. However, I think all of you know better than me. Therefore, you shall choose what the new Skylanders look like and what they do. I'll give a loose guideline to this as well. So, generally, what does your Skylander do?
14.title: The New Skylanders

choices: Transforms opponent into a living balloon.
141.content: OK, so how does he/she do it?
141.title: Inflation (Air)

142.content: OK, so how does he/she do it?
142.title: Inflation (Liquid)

143.content: OK, and how does he/she do it?
143.title: Weight Gain, or Inflation (Food)

choices: Transforms them into an inanimate object.
Make them appear to be something else.
144.content: OK, so how does he/she do it?
144.title: Transformation

1441.content: This new branch of Skylanders are known as "The New Age." They defend Earth from attacks by The Doomster. Now, which character do you want to follow?
1441.title: Transforms them into something alive.

14411.content: Rick: Willing to put his life on the line, he can take a few extra hits than his colleagues.
14411.title: Male

14412.content: Amanda: Elven mages can be dangerous if they have the right spells. She has varied types of spells, from healing to hurting.
14412.title: Female

choices: No? Well, there's still plenty more where that came from.
145.content: None of those tickled your fancy? Maybe one of these are your Skylander?
145.title: Not here? How about this?

choices: ...your body had changed from the waist down.
...your body had changed from the waist up.
...nothing out of the ordinary, except for that pendant.
15.content:
You listened to the speech that Master Eon made on your TV screen. You sat there unimpressed. "I've heard him say things like this over and over again. 'You must save the Skylands, blahbity, blar, blar.'"

You just sat there when all of a sudden the power went out. "Dang it! I have to listen to that stupid speech all over again. Thank you, defective power grid." You open the window to scream your head off, when you notice that the lights of every other house in the neighborhood was on. "What the-?" You were stopped by a strange glow coming from the center of your room.

You slowly approach your TV and see a glow coming from the Portal of Power. You definitely saw this as odd, considering even your TV was off. You looked at it and saw the top was completely flat. You poked it and it acted like Jell-o, bouncing up and down. You poked it again, and suddenly your TV lit up a blinding white. "What in the-" You barely said as the bright light got even brighter and engulfed you. Blinded, you blacked out instantly.



"Ugh..." You were coming back around. You smelled the green grass in front of you, as well as the blue sky above.

'Wait a minute? Grass? Sky?" You were shocked to find yourself in the middle of some field. You felt weird. Like something was wrong with you. You looked down at yourself and found...
15.title: Yes, you.

154.content: You found that now you're now about half your height and your skin was covered in white fur. You had your original clothes on, to recognize yourself. You tried looking around and heard a familiar voice. It was...
154.title: ...your body had changed completely.

1541.content:
Your best friend from school was also in this world. He was, instead, his hero from his hand-drawn comics. He had a wrestling mask with a mohawk, a leather jacket with spikes, and jeans and sneakers. The new outfit also came with a cat backpack.
"Dude, what the heck is going on?" He asked.
" As soon as you tell me why I'm missing the top three feet of my body!" You answered back. Then you saw a horde of monsters heading your way. You try to use anything you had on you, and then, ...
1541.title: A Familiar Face

15411.content:
You thought when you were going to die, but at the moment you shut your eyes, you heard your friend scream in pure horror. You were invisible now. The monsters were confused, and your friend was fainting. You were also freaking out.
"You need help, kids?" Said...
15411.title: You turned invisible.

choices: Team 1 (Spyro, Stealth Elf, Eruptor, Jet Vac, Pop Fizz.)
15412.content: Just then, an explosion went off in the middle of the horde. Half of the monsters were down and out. It was...
15412.title: About time you got here!

choices: Your fur turned  a different color.
1542.content: Yep, it was the purple dragon himself. He helped you up and quickly got you to the Core of Light. Hopefully, Eon can explain what the heck is going on with this transformation. Then, a group of...
1542.title: Spyro

1543.content:
An army of Bad Guys led by a squid pirate stood on the other side of the field. It raised it's sword and went charging, and that's when something happened to your fur. It changed to the color...
(Think about what element a squid would be in, then select what would be the most effective)
1543.title: An army of Bad Guys

info.brief_description: Strange events are occurring in the Skylands. How will the Skylanders adapt? Fetish zone.
info.description:
"Hello. I am Master Eon, and welcome to the Skylands. Ever since Kaos was defeated, the residents of the Skylands have lived in peace. But a new enemy has appeared, bringing chaos and disaster wherever he goes. Even you, the Portal Master, may be effected by this menace. So please take care, as you venture the Skylands with the legendary Skylanders."

*******************************************************

Hello everyone! It's me, the author. I'd just like to point some things out.

This is a fetish based story, mainly focusing around Transformations and Inflations. If you don't like reading stuff like this, go somewhere else. For the rest of you, I just want you to remember a couple of things before you add to my story:

For one, since this is a T rated story, you cannot add things like gore, sex, harsh language (preferably, no colorful language if you mind) and no popping. Popping is not actually banned with the T rating, but I just don't like it. Everything else goes.

When you enter the story, I will give you instructions as to where to go, so you don't get lost.

Good story additions will be rewarded with GPs.

Well, if you're ready, let's begin!
